title: Adobe WebType Pro
content:
Just wondering if anyone has used any of these typefaces for screen work and if so whether they can vouch for them being better on screen than their stock standard counterparts.

[http://store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P\_1507.html?newsample=&x=28&y=8](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019152304/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1507.html?newsample=&x=28&y=8 "http://store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P\_1507.html?newsample=&x=28&y=8")

Cheers,  
iota.
author: i0ta

comments.content:
Not seen a side-by-side comparison, but my guess is because they are hinted TrueType fonts you will see better rendering on Windows.

Si
